channel.title: Kami - Manga Downloader's' Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 0.1.1 (Mangareader.net only, auto-update feature)
item.description:
Version 0.1.1

Features

  • Fetch list of chapters for the queried manga on MangaReader.net
  • Download multiple chapters
  • Integration with OS X notification center
  • Pause/Resume download in-app (progress currently not saved if the app is quitted)
  • Basic bookmarks management (save/delete URL of a specific manga)
  • Check and download update in app thanks to Sparkle
